statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '2 days'
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Outliers WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND outlier_value > 100
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND sensor_value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE id = 1 AND sensor_id = 10
DELETE FROM outliers WHERE sensor_id = 20 AND id = 2
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Lab A' AND calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM outlier_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
